com.layers.app.controller

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.layers.app.controller.UserController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(value="/user")
 @SessionAttributes(value={"userToken","locationToken","requestToken"})
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object

    Provides all the User associated request handlers. This controller focuses on account related requests that include validating a users credentials, creating an accounts, and logging an account out. This controller will eventually include handlers that modify user info.

    Implements context dependency injected interfaces to execute the request. Request handlers catch business logic thrown exceptions to assemble a proper response. Each function is documented by logging the result of each request.

    See Also:
    UserBusinessInterface, ILogger
